milestone.title: Phase 3
milestone.description:
refine the data on many instances of each model
refine the dynamic website with many pages hosted on Amazon Web Services (AWS)
add filtering, pagination, searching, and sorting to the model pages
searching must be Google-like and handle many terms
use JavaScript and React as a GUI framework
use Python, Flask, Flask-Restless, SQLAlchemy as a Web framework
use MySQL or PostgreSQL as a DB
refine the a RESTful API using Postman
refine the unit tests of the RESTful API with Postman
refine the unit tests of the JavaScript code using Mocha
refine the unit tests of the Python code using unittest
refine the acceptance tests of the GUI with Selenium
refine the documentation of the RESTful API using GitBook
refine the technical report using Grammarly and GitBook
refine the self critique and the other critique using GitBook
refine the a UML diagram
create 5 more user stories, 15 total, on GitHub project boards

-i.e. if our front end is the customer, we should be able to make requests to our backend API service to meaningfully populate our front end

Story points estimation: 5

title: As a user, I can see all updated stats and information on the About page of the application
body:
-About page needs to be updated to include our # of unit tests per person and total commits, issues, etc.
-Make any refinements necessary to Phase 2 

Story points estimation: 1

title: As a customer, I can see updated documentation pertaining to Phase 2 in the Gitbook report
body:
-Update our gitbook documentation to reflect changes in Phase 2 
-This includes updated API documentation (any API changes, formatted in multi-page layout, include error responses), critiques, and overall docs

Story points estimation: 5

title: As a user, I can navigate through the application flawlessly due to full coverage and effective application testing
body:
-Includes Postman API testing, Mocha JS Unit Testing, Pythong unittest unit testing, GUI acceptance tests using Selenium

-Story points estimation: 13 (~3 per testing suite)

title: As a user, I can navigate to several other model instances from a single model
body:
-Allow data instances of various models to be connected/related for user to navigate through the site seamlessly

Story points estimation: 5

title: As a user, I can view several instances of each model on the application
body:
-at least 9 instances per model 

Story points estimation: 8
